NormallyClosed.title: Normally Closed Switch
NormallyClosed.description: Check to make the switch normally-closed (on). Default is normally-open (off).

SwitchStayOn.title: Stateful
SwitchStayOn.description: Check to make the switch stateful (remain on after trigger).

Time.title: Auto Off Time (in ms)
Time.description: Duration in milliseconds that the switch stays on after triggering. Only relevant if the switch is not stateful.

UseLogFile.title: Monitor Log File
UseLogFile.description: Check if this switch will be triggered by log file keywords/phrases.

LogFilePath.title: Log File Path
LogFilePath.description: Enter the full path to the log file.

Keywords.title: Keywords
Keywords.description: Enter keywords/phrases that will trigger the switch when they appear in the log file (case independent).

EnableStartupDelay.title: Enable Startup Delay
EnableStartupDelay.description: Delay the switch activation after Homebridge starts.

StartupDelay.title: Startup Delay (in ms)
StartupDelay.description: Time in milliseconds to delay the switch start after Homebridge restarts.

RememberState.title: Restart in last known state
RememberState.description: Switch will restart in its last known state (only for non-log-monitoring stateful switches).
